xwikidoc.name: AdminPresentationSheet
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: AdminPresentationSheet
xwikidoc.content: ### Administrate the presentation preferences globally and at space level. #if("$!editor" == 'globaladmin') #set($legend = ['header', 'panels', 'footer', 'skin']) #else #set($legend = ['header', 'panels', 'skin']) #end #set($params = $util.hashMap) #set($params.header = ['title', 'meta']) #set($params.panels = ['showLeftPanels', 'leftPanels', 'showRightPanels', 'rightPanels']) #if("$!editor" == 'globaladmin') #set($params.footer = ['webcopyright', 'version']) #set($params.skin = ['skin', 'colorTheme', 'stylesheet', 'stylesheets']) #else #set($params.skin = ['skin', 'stylesheet', 'stylesheets']) #end #includeForm('XWiki.AdminFieldsDisplaySheet')
